helpers.levelTooltipLabel: How the AI uses your English level
helpers.levelTooltip:
The AI adjusts its tone based on your choice.
BEGINNER · Uses simpler words and sentence structures.
INTERMEDIATE · Uses intermediate vocabulary and phrasing.
ADVANCED or NATIVE · Uses richer vocabulary and more complex sentences.
You can change your English level anytime from the profile page.
